summary: So because of Tumblr's shenanigans and bad decision, I decided to simply move out of this website, since I don't want to support...
caption:
So because of Tumblr’s shenanigans and bad decision, I decided to simply move out of this website, since I don’t want to support any of @staff’s decisions anymore, and it was getting harder to grow here anyway. Here are the sites I’m gonna be using from now on:

Pillowfort: https://www.pillowfort.io/PocketyHat
This is a website that’s like Tumblr! For now it’s in closed beta, so most of you might not be able to follow me immediately, but for those who already have an account here, here’s my link!
Here’s where I’ll do whatever I was doing on this blog right here, with a bit of doodles and art here and there mixed in since as of yet this website does not allow for sideblogs. Or else I would have remade all my blogs there already, including Femmy and my art blog.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PocketyHat
I’ve already been using Twitter for a while now, and it’s pretty much the place where I just tweet about whatever comes to mind, post art occasionally, share photos of things I manage to cook and other misc stuff. I try to keep retweeting to a minimum here, and I’m fairly active whenever I’m not too busy or depressed.

DeviantArt: https://www.deviantart.com/pocketyhat
I’ve used DA on a different account once, before I even knew Tumblr was a thing. I then migrated to Tumblr because DA felt too stressing and strict for me, and Tumblr allowed me to just…..…doodle and interact with people with my own drawings y'know? Plus ask blog format.
I have had this account for a while mostly to make sure nobody used the username in case I decided to return. I guess I am gonna return after all.
Anyway, I haven’t touched on the page yet, nor have I posted anything, but here I’ll try to post my more finished artwork, both old to catch up and new, but I’m not sure how else I might use the site. Guess we’ll have to wait an see!

FurAffinity: http://www.furaffinity.net/user/pocketyhat/
…Listen, I don’t draw NSFW, maybe something suggestive at max but
I draw furry characters. Where else to post my furries if not in this site?
I have NEVER touched on this site, so again I’m not sure how I might use this, but we’ll see! If ya’ll like my furry and pony art maybe go here.

I was supposed to also have an Instagram account but for some reason it got disabled and I have no idea why since I only made one single post ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
But if I get it back, I’m pocketyhat there as well, so keep an eye out for that!


So what’s gonna happen to your blogs?

I’m not planning to delete anything, don’t worry. I might be leaving the site, but the content I’ve made stays here unless Tumblr says otherwise. I’ve backed the blogs up and exported them, so I have them safe with me in case anything goes wrong.

But hey what about female doctor whooves?

I’ve backed it up to wordpress in case Tumblr decides to nuke it for whatever reason. http://femaledoctorwhooves.wordpress.com/
My course has been eating up my time so I haven’t had the brain energy to actually think what my plans for the future of that blog are. So for now, until the end of my course in February, consider the blog set on an indefinite hiatus. I know it’s disappointing, but I don’t wanna make any harsh decisions with it for now, and despite it all, femmy is still my baby and I am proud of what I’ve done with that blog. I really want to be careful with this. There’s a chance I might simply continue the blog as normal. But there’s also a chance that I might simply stop the blog and immediately go on with the spiritual successor I had in mind for it. It’s really uncertain, but please, whatever I decide to do, understand that I deeply love my little ask blog and I honest to god wish to show you the journey and how it ends. But circumstances might not allow me to do as I wish, so please understand.

Are you gonna not come back to Tumblr?

Eh, I might check in from time to time, see if my mutuals and people I follow have other places I can check them out on and/or to catch up and just see posts like normal. But sparingly of course. I’m going to avoid making new posts here unless either 1 it’s urgent and really necessary or 2 Tumblr actually becomes a better website and stop making bad decisions every single update.

As final note, I’d like to say that I don’t regret using this website. I’ve made many friends in this platform, and because of them I’ve become the person I am today. Sure, traumas and bullshit have happened, but I can’t cloud the positive with the negatives right? Haha
Right now I don’t agree with where the website is heading, so it’s better for me to simply pack my bags and share my content elsewhere before the site gets worse than it already is.
I hope you understand my reasons, and thank you for sticking around this long. See you elsewhere!

tags: excerpt from a book i'll never write
summary: Since when we became objects, since when we became careless, since when we dont apreciate small things of life, since when we...
caption: Since when we became objects, since when we became careless, since when we dont apreciate small things of life, since when we put people to the test, to see who entertains us more, we dont let anybody to know us, we dont let us know others, we dont express emotions, we are cold, senseless, fake, distant, violent, the society is rotten.

reblog.comment: Since when we became objects, since when we became careless, since when we dont apreciate small things of life, since when we put people to the test, to see who entertains us more, we dont let anybody to know us, we dont let us know others, we dont express emotions, we are cold, senseless, fake, distant, violent, the society is rotten.

summary:
16, December 2018
——————
Finally got back to working on this practice animation. Now that I Have the hair sort of figured out, I...
body:
16, December 2018

——————

Finally got back to working on this practice animation. Now that I Have the hair sort of figured out, I was able to enjoy animating this again. Now I’ll be working on the line art, then the colors.

reblog.comment:
16, December 2018

——————

Finally got back to working on this practice animation. Now that I Have the hair sort of figured out, I was able to enjoy animating this again. Now I’ll be working on the line art, then the colors.

trail.content_raw:
16, December 2018

——————

Finally got back to working on this practice animation. Now that I Have the hair sort of figured out, I was able to enjoy animating this again. Now I’ll be working on the line art, then the colors.
trail.content:
16, December 2018

——————

Finally got back to working on this practice animation. Now that I Have the hair sort of figured out, I was able to enjoy animating this again. Now I’ll be working on the line art, then the colors.

summary: A friend sent me something from Tumblr about a goth boy and a rabbit named Lucifer which I had to draw. I can imagine it as a...
body: A friend sent me something from Tumblr about a goth boy and a rabbit named Lucifer which I had to draw. I can imagine it as a funny comic series about the spirit of Lucifer being stuck in a rabbit. 😂

reblog.comment: A friend sent me something from Tumblr about a goth boy and a rabbit named Lucifer which I had to draw. I can imagine it as a funny comic series about the spirit of Lucifer being stuck in a rabbit. 😂

trail.content_raw: A friend sent me something from Tumblr about a goth boy and a rabbit named Lucifer which I had to draw. I can imagine it as a funny comic series about the spirit of Lucifer being stuck in a rabbit. 😂
trail.content: A friend sent me something from Tumblr about a goth boy and a rabbit named Lucifer which I had to draw. I can imagine it as a funny comic series about the spirit of Lucifer being stuck in a rabbit. 😂

blog.name: starite

blog.description: - Infinite space is my only home. - ★ My art tag. ★

summary: hey guys! I’m opening a sort of emergency commission set!  i’ve just ran into some financial issues regarding school and tuition...
caption:
hey guys! I’m opening a sort of emergency commission set!  i’ve just ran into some financial issues regarding school and tuition hahah 

the style of these commissions can be done in two ways, i provided examples too! If you have questions about other styles feel free to dm me or email me at Starite.x@gmail.com! also my art tag has more examples of my work or u can find a more organized list in my art blog @starites !

reblogs are appreciated ty!
